scripts.test:all:
rm -f /tmp/test-errors.log /tmp/test-success.log; total=$(find test -name '*.ts' | wc -l); printf "Total tests: $total
Note: 1 dot = 1 file processed
"; find test -name '*.ts' -print0 | xargs -0 -n 1 -P 8 sh -c 'mkdir -p /tmp/test-output-$(dirname $1) && NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" npx hardhat test $1 > /tmp/test-output-$1.log 2>&1 && echo $1 >> /tmp/test-success.log || echo $1 >> /tmp/test-errors.log; num_dots=$((RANDOM % 3 + 1)); for i in $(seq 1 $num_dots); do printf "."; done' sh; printf "
Tests completed. Successes: 
"; cat /tmp/test-success.log; printf "Errors: 
"; if [ -f /tmp/test-errors.log ]; then cat /tmp/test-errors.log; else printf "No errors found.
"; fi; printf "Total tests run: $(cat /tmp/test-success.log | wc -l)
"
